app.name: EnvironmentSwitcher
app.author: Acer_51
app.long_description: A Wii U homebrew utility for switching environments: - Supports Aroma, Tiramisu, and CBHC/Legacy - Brick-safe .cfg handling with rollback - Full logging to SD card - UI styled after TCPGecko (my favorite app :3) - Wii U GamePad ONLY!!! (no wiimotes sadly, didn't get that ready yet) - Auto reboots
